newsitem.title: UK: Fox retains key UK Conservative committee chair.
newsitem.headline: Fox retains key UK Conservative committee chair.

text.p: Veteran British parliamentarian Marcus Fox is to retain the chairmanship of the key 1922 committee of backbench Conservative members of parliament in the run-up to the general election.
A list of nominations for key posts on the committee published on Wednesday showed that Fox, who has held the job since 1992, was unopposed to keep it in the current session of parliament.

Officers of the 1922 committee are charged with conveying to ministers, when the Conservatives are in power, the feeling in the parliamentary party on major political issues. -- London Newsroom +44 171 5427767
